generalContent.pageTitle: ni- Book your theory test - GOV.UK

phaseBanner.content: ni-This is a new service – your {{-openLink}}feedback{{-closeLink}} will help us to improve it. // {{ target  }} //

footer.covidImpact: ni-how theory tests are affected by coronavirus (COVID-19)

cookie.cookieText: ni-GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler.

chooseSupport.heading1: ni-Get the right support during your theory test
chooseSupport.heading2: ni-You may be able to select the support you want and book your test online now.
chooseSupport.para1: ni-We want you to have everything you need to take your test.
chooseSupport.para2: ni-Many types of support are available if, for example, you:
chooseSupport.para3: ni-You can {{-openLink}}ni-learn more about the types of support available{{-closeLink}}. ni-These include:
chooseSupport.para4: ni-Alternatively, you can tell us you want support and we'll get in touch with you.
chooseSupport.para5: ni-This may suit you better because we'll be able to:
chooseSupport.list2-3: ni-extra time to complete your test
chooseSupport.list2-4: ni-someone reading the questions for you
chooseSupport.list3-1: ni-talk to you about how we can help
chooseSupport.list3-2: ni-make any special arrangements you might need
chooseSupport.list3-3: ni-talk about whether we need any evidence to support your request
chooseSupport.legend: ni-Do you want support for your theory test?

details.heading: ni-Details of the person taking the theory test
details.headingSupport: ni-Provide a few details to get the right support
details.p1: ni-Enter the driving licence details of the person taking the test.
details.p2: ni-These details are checked and used to show information about the candidate's available tests and any test history.
details.p3: ni-It's important the information is entered exactly as it looks on the driving licence.
details.errorMessage: ni-The details entered aren't correct. Please enter the details exactly as they appear on the licence

firstnamesField.label: ni-First and middle names
firstnamesField.description: ni-Enter the first and any middle names of the person taking the test. Do not include Miss, Ms, Mrs or Mr.
firstnamesField.hint: ni-See section 2 of the driving licence

surnameField.label: ni-Last names
surnameField.description: ni-Enter the surname of the person taking the test.
surnameField.hint: ni-See section 1 of the driving licence

licenceNumberField.label: ni-Driving licence number
licenceNumberField.description: ni-Enter the 16-digit driving licence number of the person taking the test.
licenceNumberField.hint: ni-See section 5 of the driving licence

dobField.label: ni-Date of birth
dobField.description: ni-Enter the date of birth of the person taking the test.

contactDetails.heading: ni-Email of the person taking the theory test
contactDetails.description: ni-We need an email address to send a booking confirmation and a payment receipt.
contactDetails.hint: ni-Make sure this is the email for the person taking the theory test.
contactDetails.changeAlert: ni-You can change the email address associated with this booking or {{-openLink}}keep the last one saved{{-closeLink}}.
contactDetails.emailTooLong: ni-Email address must be 100 characters or fewer
contactDetails.unmatchingError: ni-Ensure confirmation email address matches email address

nonStandardAccommodation.heading: ni-Enter your email address
nonStandardAccommodation.description: ni-Confirmation of your support request will be emailed to you.

testType.heading: ni-Which theory test are you booking?
testType.changeAlert: ni-You can change the test type or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.
testType.changeWarning: ni-Important: if you change the test type here and continue to make this booking, all details previously entered will be replaced.
testType.cancelChangeButton: ni-Cancel and keep existing test type
testType.subheading: ni-Booking other types of theory tests
testType.entitlementText: ni-To drive a particular type of vehicle, you need an ‘entitlement’ for that category on your driving licence.
testType.licenceCategoryLinkText: ni-driving licence categories for more information
testType.validationError: ni-You need to select an option.

testLanguage.heading: ni-Which language do you want to appear on screen during the theory test?
testLanguage.changeAlert: ni-You can change the test language or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.

translator.heading: ni-Which language do you want translated?
translator.description: ni-Tell us which language you want translated so you can take your driving theory test.

errorMessages.empty: ni-Enter the language you need translated
errorMessages.tooLong: ni-The translation language description must be 100 characters or fewer

findTestCentre.heading: ni-Choose a theory test centre
findTestCentre.subheading: ni-Find your nearest driving theory test centre
findTestCentre.listItem1: ni-get a map and directions to the centre
findTestCentre.listItem2: ni-check any special instructions for using the centre
findTestCentre.searchLabel: ni-Enter a postcode, town or city name or region. You can also use landmarks
findTestCentre.errorNotRecognised: ni-No location results match your search. Please try again.

editMode.changeAlert: ni-You can change the test location here or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.importantWarning: ni-If you select a new location here, it will replace your previous choice. Date and time slots will still be subject to availability.
editMode.cancelChangeButton: ni-Cancel and keep previously selected test location

selectTestCentre.heading: ni-Choose a theory test centre
selectTestCentre.mapSelectHint: ni-Select a test centre on the map

error.heading: ni-That search didn't work
error.paragraph1: ni-A technical problem interrupted the location search.
error.paragraph2: ni-You can {{-openLink}}try another search now{{-closeLink}} or wait and try again later. If this problem persists, contact DVSA.

editMode.changeAlert: ni-You can change the test location here or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.

selectDate.heading: ni-Enter a date to check for available theory test time slots
selectDate.description: ni-If no test slots are available on this date, this service can help you find one on another day.

errorMessages.dayEmpty: ni-You need to enter a day
errorMessages.monthEmpty: ni-You need to enter a month
errorMessages.yearEmpty: ni-You need to enter a year
errorMessages.dateInPast: ni-Date must be in the future
errorMessages.dateIsToday: ni-No test slots are available today. Try another date.
errorMessages.dateBeyond6Months: ni-Date must be within 6 months of today

editMode.changeAlert: ni-You can change the test slot here or {{-openLink}}keep the date and time previously selected{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.importantWarning: ni-If you select a new date and time here they will replace the details previously entered. Date and time slots are both subject to availability.
editMode.cancelChangeButton: ni-Cancel and keep previously selected date and time

chooseAppointment.heading: ni-Choose a time for the theory test
chooseAppointment.instruction: ni-Check time slots at a different test centre

editMode.changeAlert:
ni-You can change the test time here or {{-openLink}}keep the time previously selected{{-closeLink}}.
Date and time slots are both subject to availability.

chooseAppointment.warningPast: ni-Days in the past cannot be viewed
chooseAppointment.warningSixMonths: ni-This day is not yet available for booking. Check regularly as this may change.

bookingConfirmation.heading: ni-Theory test booking confirmed
bookingConfirmation.bookingRefPrompt: ni-You'll need it to check, cancel or reschedule this test. Consider taking a screenshot, or
bookingConfirmation.personMust: ni-The person taking the test must:
bookingConfirmation.arrive: ni-arrive 15 minutes before the test start time
bookingConfirmation.bringLicence: ni-bring their driving licence (Old-style, paper licence-holders should also bring a valid passport, or other photo-ID)
bookingConfirmation.security: ni-All test centres are security monitored.
bookingConfirmation.itemsCheck: ni-As you enter the test room, you'll be checked for items that could be used to cheat. Your test will not go ahead if you do not allow this check.
bookingConfirmation.cheatWarning: ni-It is illegal to cheat in a theory test. You can be sent to prison and banned from driving.
bookingConfirmation.itemsPrompt: ni-When you arrive at the test centre, all personal items must be placed in the secure locker provided. These items include:

items.phones: ni-mobile phones and other electronic devices

bookingConfirmation.foundItems: ni-If you are found to have any of these items in the test room:
bookingConfirmation.voided: ni-your test may be stopped and voided
bookingConfirmation.leave: ni-you may be asked to leave
bookingConfirmation.refunded: ni-the test fee may not be refunded
bookingConfirmation.noWaiting: ni-Test centres have no waiting facilities for any adults or children accompanying candidates.
bookingConfirmation.learnMore: ni-Learn more about preparing for a car theory test including free practice tests here:
bookingConfirmation.cancelSubheading: ni-Checking, moving or cancelling this theory test
bookingConfirmation.cancellationThreeDays: ni-Theory tests can be moved or cancelled up to 3 clear working days before without penalty.
bookingConfirmation.cancellationPolicy: ni-If this booking is changed or cancelled after {{latestRefundDate}} no refund will be made.
bookingConfirmation.checkDetails: ni-Check the details of this test here:

nonStandardAccommodation.pageHeading: ni-Success: your details have been received
nonStandardAccommodation.panelContact: ni-We will contact you within one working day to arrange your theory test
nonStandardAccommodation.printPagePrompt: ni-You may find it useful to
nonStandardAccommodation.prepareParagraph: ni-Learn more about preparing for a car theory test including free practise tests here:
nonStandardAccommodation.supportParagraph: ni-For some kinds of support you may be asked to provide a letter from a teacher or doctor.

changeLocationTime.title: ni-What do you want to change?
changeLocationTime.changeAlert: ni-You can change your previous response here or {{-openLink}}go back and keep it{{-closeLink}}.
changeLocationTime.description: ni-Select one option. Your existing booking will be held until you make and confirm any changes.
changeLocationTime.validationError: ni-Please select what you want to change

changeTimeOnlyOption.label: ni-Just the time of the theory test
changeTimeOnlyOption.hint: ni-New time slots on your existing test day may not be available.

changeTimeAndDateOption.label: ni-Time and date of the theory test
changeTimeAndDateOption.hint: ni-Your existing time slot may be unavailable on a different day.

changeLocationOption.label: ni-Location of the theory test
changeLocationOption.hint: ni-Your existing date and time slot may be unavailable at a different location.

manageBookingLogin.pageTitle: ni-Booking reference and driving licence number
manageBookingLogin.heading: ni-Enter the booking reference and driving licence number of the person taking the theory test

bookingReferenceField.label: ni-Booking reference
bookingReferenceField.description: ni-The booking reference number was sent to the email address used to book the theory test. If you have not received a booking reference, contact

licenceNumberField.heading: ni-Driving licence number
licenceNumberField.label: ni-Enter your driving licence number
licenceNumberField.description: ni-It's important that the driving licence number is entered exactly as it looks on the driving licence of the person taking the test.
licenceNumberField.hint: ni-See section 5 of the driving licence

errorMessages.fieldsLeftBlank: ni-Enter both the booking reference and candidate's driving licence number to access this booking
errorMessages.incorrectDetails: ni-This booking cannot be accessed using the information entered. Check both the booking reference and driving licence number are correct and try again.

manageBookingHome.pageTitle: ni-Booking reference and driving licence number
manageBookingHome.noBookings: ni-You have no theory tests booked.
manageBookingHome.bookNewTestLink: ni-You can {{-openLink}}book another theory test here{{-closeLink}}.

bookingsWithErrors.header: ni-A technical problem means these test bookings cannot be found:
bookingsWithErrors.contentLine1: ni-Please contact DVSA to recover or reschedule this test.

manageBookingChange.heading: ni-Change, reschedule or cancel this theory test
manageBookingChange.refundWarningText: ni-You cannot get a refund or reschedule this test after {{date}}.
manageBookingChange.testTodayWarningText: ni-This test is today. Changes are no longer possible.
manageBookingChange.technicalProblemWarningText: ni-A technical problem means this booking cannot currently be cancelled or changed. Please try again later.

manageBookingCancel.heading: ni-Cancel this theory test
manageBookingCancel.description: ni-Select one option. When you select
manageBookingCancel.description-2: ni-your existing booking will be permanently removed.
manageBookingCancel.contact: ni-Contact the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) to get help cancelling your theory test appointment.
manageBookingCancel.niPrompt: ni-There’s a different service to cancel your theory test in Northern Ireland.

manageBookingCancelConfirmation.cancelDescription: ni-This driving theory test has been cancelled.

error.heading: ni-Booking not cancelled
error.contentLine1: ni-A technical problem prevented this booking from being cancelled.
error.contentLine2: ni-You can {{-openLink}}try again to cancel this booking{{-closeLink}}. If this problem persists, contact DVSA.

general.contentLine1: ni-A technical problem prevented this test from being changed.
general.contentLine2: ni-You can {{-openLink}}try again to change this booking{{-closeLink}}. If this problem persists, contact DVSA.

slotUnavailable.contentLine1: ni-The new test slot you attempted to book is no longer available. {{-openLink}}Select another slot and try again{{-closeLink}}.
slotUnavailable.contentLine2: ni-Contact DVSA if you have any questions. The existing booking remains unchanged.

noRetry.contentLine1: ni-A technical problem means your booking cannot be found.
noRetry.contentLine2: ni-Please contact DVSA to recover or reschedule this test.

voiceover.pageHeading: ni-Which voiceover language do you want?

editMode.pageHeading: ni-Do you want a voiceover used during the test?
editMode.validationError: ni-You must select a voiceover language. Alternatively, select 'I do not want a voiceover'.
editMode.contentLine1: ni-Instructions and the test questions will be read aloud through headphones provided in the test room.
editMode.changeAlert: ni-You can change your mind here about hearing a voiceover used during the test, or
editMode.changeAlertLink: ni-go back and keep your previous choice
editMode.yesOptionPrefix: ni-Yes, I want a voiceover in
editMode.noOption: ni-No, I do not want a voiceover
editMode.cancelChangeButton: ni-Cancel and keep your existing choice

manageBookingChangeBSL.pageHeading: ni-Do you want British Sign Language used during the test?
manageBookingChangeBSL.formHint: ni-Instructions and the test questions will be signed on screen in the test room.
manageBookingChangeBSL.errorBannerNotification: ni-You need to select an option.
manageBookingChangeBSL.bslFormOption: ni-Yes, I want British Sign Language
manageBookingChangeBSL.noneFormOption: ni-No, I do not want British Sign Language

editMode.pageHeading: ni-Do you want British Sign Language?
editMode.changeAlert: ni-You can change your mind about including British Sign Language in this theory test or {{-openLink}}go back and keep your previous choice{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.cancelChangeButton: ni-Cancel and keep your existing choice

leavingNsa.heading: ni-Book your theory test online now or wait and talk to us first
leavingNsa.paragraph1: ni-You can select 'Continue' to book your theory test online now.
leavingNsa.paragraph2: ni-Or, if you prefer, select 'Talk to our support team' and we'll contact you at a convenient time to:
leavingNsa.bullet2: ni-check you have the right support

stayingNsa.pageHeading: ni-We'll contact you about support for your theory test
stayingNsa.paragraph1: ni-Thank you for providing these details. You won't be able to book your test online right now. We need to know a little more about the kind of support that will help you.
stayingNsa.paragraph2: ni-Tell us how to contact you and we'll get in touch to make arrangements.
stayingNsa.paragraph3: ni-It will help us arrange your test if you can tell us where and when you would like to take it.

customSupport.pageHeading: ni-Tell us what support you need
customSupport.paragraph1: ni-Accessible support is available to help make your theory test more comfortable.
customSupport.paragraph2: ni-You can provide more information about what you need here.
customSupport.paragraph3: ni-Select 'Continue' if you would prefer to talk about this when we contact you.
customSupport.paragraph4: ni-Some types of support need time to arrange. This means you may not be able to book online now.
customSupport.errorMessage: ni-The text you enter here must be 4000 characters or fewer

selectSupportType.pageTitle: ni-Which type of support do you need
selectSupportType.heading1: ni-What test support do you want?
selectSupportType.para1: ni-Accessible support is available to make your theory test more comfortable.
selectSupportType.para2: ni-Select the items you want for your test. If you need something else, select 'Other'.
selectSupportType.option2: ni-An interpreter next to me using British Sign Language
selectSupportType.option6: ni-Someone to ask the test questions in a different way (an Oral Language Modifier)
selectSupportType.option7: ni-Someone to read the test to me and enter my answers

errors.noneSelected: ni-You must select at least one option. If the support you want is not listed, select 'Other'.
errors.badCombination: ni-You have selected sign language and voiceover. Please select only one of these options. If the support you want is not listed, select 'Other'.

voicemail.pageHeading: ni-Can we leave telephone messages if we can't reach you?

preferredDay.pageHeading: ni-Is there a day and time that's best for you?
preferredDay.paragraph1: ni-Tell us if there's a particular time of day, or day of the week that's better for you. We will try to arrange your test around these choices.
preferredDay.paragraph2: ni-If you are flexible about when you take your test, select 'I will decide this later'.
preferredDay.option1: ni-I want a particular time or day
preferredDay.errorMessage: ni-The text you enter here must be 4000 characters or fewer

preferredLocation.pageHeading: ni-Do you know which test locations you want?
preferredLocation.paragraph1: ni-Tell us if your test needs to be a in a particular place.
preferredLocation.paragraph2: ni-If you are flexible about where you take your test, select 'I will decide this later'.
preferredLocation.option1: ni-I know which locations I want

option1Content.paragraph1: ni-Tell us if there are particular locations that would be better for taking your test. For example, 'Leeds and Bradford' or 'south London'.
option1Content.paragraph2: ni-You can also include any test centre features that would help you to take your test. For example:
option1Content.bullet1: ni-close to a train station or bus stop
option1Content.bullet3: ni-not located in a high-rise building

preferredLocation.option1Hint: ni-Enter the test locations you want
preferredLocation.errorMessage: ni-The text you enter here must be 4000 characters or fewer

telephoneContact.heading: ni-Would you prefer to be contacted by telephone?
telephoneContact.telephoneTooLongError: ni-The telephone number must be 50 characters or fewer

500.heading: ni-Service temporarily unavailable
500.description: ni-A technical problem with our system means this service isn't available right now.
500.apology: ni-We're very sorry. Please try again later.
